item.description:
Join us for some games in the lounge area of The Roundabout Diner located on the traffic circle in Portsmouth, NH.

 

We had a great time last visit, and the food was good so lets do it again!

 

Take a look a the menu here: http://www.roundaboutdiner.com/menus.cfm

 

I will send an email update with a few game choices in the next few days, as it will make packing easier on these nights. If you have suggestions, please let me know.

 

They have a few tables out back that they said we could game on.

 

I've asked that we be able to game until 9pm. Also late additions are welcome, Just let us know what time you are able to show up in the RSVP.

 

As long as we get people the Meetup will happen! If for some reason there is not any interest I will call the Meetup off at NOON on Tuesday the 28th.

Please RSVP or email me if you are planning on attending so I have an accurate head count.

 

See ya there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back lounge area.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Games at The Roundabout Diner Take II
